definition.name: NXscanbox_em
definition.doc: Description of the scan box which is instructed by the microscope control software to direct the probe to controlled locations according to a scan scheme and plan.

symbol.doc: Number of pixel in the x direction
symbol.name: n_x

symbol.doc: Number of pixel in the y direction
symbol.name: n_y

symbol.doc: Physical size of a pixel in x direction
symbol.name: d_x

symbol.doc: Physical size of a pixel in y direction
symbol.name: d_y

field.name: program
field.doc: Commercial or otherwise given name to the program which was used to execute this analysis.

attribute.name: version
attribute.doc: Ideally program version plus build number, or commit hash or description of ever persistent resources where the source code of the program and build instructions can be found so that the program can be configured ideally in such a manner that the result of this computational process is recreatable in the same deterministic manner.

field.name: calibration_style
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues which suggestions to put as enumerations.

field.name: center
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues how to use and interpret this.

field.name: flyback_time
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues how to use and interpret this.

field.name: field_of_view
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues how to use and interpret this.

field.name: line_time
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues how to use and interpret this.

field.name: pixel_time
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues how to use and interpret this.

field.name: requested_pixel_time
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues how to use and interpret this.

field.name: rotation
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues how to use and interpret this.

field.name: ac_line_sync
field.doc: Remains to be discussed with colleagues how to use and interpret this.
